lom:description.lom:string: This "print on demand" publication provides a comprehensive review of decades of studies on women in science, mathematics and engineering from K-12 through industry. Factors covered include: scientific disciplines, socioeconomic status, race, class, physical and learning disabilities and sexual orientation.

lom:keyword.lom:string: gender equity, gender differences, gender bias, Occupational Segregation, policy

lom:title.lom:string: The Equity Equation: Fostering the Advancement of Women in the Sciences, Mathematics, and Engineering
